Title: The Studio
Writer: Evan Goldberg, Alex Gregory, Peter Huyck
Actors: Seth Rogen, Catherine O'Hara, Ike Barinholtz
Plot: Follows a legacy Hollywood movie studio striving to survive in a world where it is increasingly difficult for art and business to live together.
Awards: Won 13 Primetime Emmys. 25 wins & 41 nominations total
